bio: Full stack developer with 3+ years industry experience in developing secure web applications, web services, and mobile applications. Hands-on experience with various on-demand technologies like Java, PL/SQL, Web frameworks like Spring, Tapestry, Hibernate, Angular 2+ and worked with various AWS Cloud services.

education.instituteName: University of North Carolina at Charlotte

roles: Experience working in Agile development following the Scrum process, Sprint and weekly standup meetings
Actively involved in the analysis of project requirements specified by the client
Supported production deployment efficiently and troubleshoot issues in the production environment
Designed and developed various application features using Spring, Tapestry 4.0 frameworks and also used tacos library for providing Ajax behavior for tapestry components
Designed and developed interactive user interface screens using HTML5, tapestry, and CSS3
Performed client-side operations and validations using Javascript, Ajax and jQuery
Configured and implemented Amazon Web Services such as SNS, SES and Ring Central API’s for notifications
Improved user security by implementing multi-factor authentication and time based generated passcodes
Developed DAOs using JPA, Hibernate Criteria API and also written complex HQL  and SQL queries
Used Log4j for logging and handling issues of the application during the development process
Configured and worked on the Application Servers such as Wildfly 10
Worked with ANT build and used Hudson continuous integration tool for automated deployment
Performed Unit testing by implementing Junit test cases for ensuring code coverage
Worked in using web-based version control tool SVN for tracking code changes and code merge
Developed Web application for Educational training website using Angular 6, Spring boot, Hibernate, SQL and AWS
Developed and Supported Applications using various web technologies like HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Spring, Hibernate, Node JS, Angular 6 and React JS
Developed and Supported in the implementation of RESTful Services using Spring boot, Hibernate5 with JPA & SQL
Developed Reusable Angular Components using Typescript, NPM, HTML5, and Bootstrap
Developed and supported in building Angular Services integrating with REST API’s
Worked on handling and maintaining application security, user sessions, logging and validations of data
Supported the trainees by making them understand different web stacks like Spring, Angular 6, React JS, Node JS
Worked in building test cases for performing unit testing using the TestNG framework
Used GIT for source control version management tool
Experienced in working extensively in continuous integration and delivery using Jenkins
Solved coding and application level issues by debugging the code written by the trainees
Developed RESTful services for a Social Media Mobile Application to consume and handle all necessary user back-end operations
Designed and developed REST API’s using Spring boot, Hibernate with JPA, MySQL
Handled user sessions using JWT Token and used log4j for logging all the user activity in the log file
Performed unit testing using JUnit and tested API’s using Postman tool before integrating them
Worked with different AWS services like EC2, SNS, SQS
Used EC2 service for deploying the back end application
Used RDS service for the handling MySQL database instance and
Used S3 storage service for storing high-quality images uploads made by end users
Utilized GIT as a repository to manage application code and tracking all code changes by the  development team
Developed various transaction modules for a Banking Web Application which involves both Front-end UI development and back-end operations
Developed User interfaces using JSP, Spring forms, JSTL, Bootstrap, HTML5 and used JavaScript, jQuery for performing Client-side operations and validations
Handled all incoming user requests by developing Spring controllers using Spring MVC and implemented DAO, Service layers for backend interactions using Spring JDBC
Developed Stored Procedures, complex SQL statements for effective retrieval and storage of data into Oracle database version 10g
Developed test cases and performed unit testing using JUnit, Mockito framework and configured Log4j for logging and handling defects in the application
Worked with an Agile development team and performed a test-driven development approach
GIT for Source control and Version managing of all codes and resources
